text: Tyoplaya Gora () is an urban locality (an urban-type settlement) in Gornozavodsky District of Perm Krai, Russia, located on the western slopes of the Ural Mountains, on the Koyva River, from the border with Sverdlovsk Oblast. Population: ==History== Urban-type settlement status was granted to it in 1928. ==Transportation== A paved road connects Tyoplaya Gora with Gornozavodsk and Kachkanar. ==References== ==External links== *Great Soviet Encyclopedia. Entry on Tyoplaya Gora *Encyclopedia of Perm Krai. Entry on Tyoplaya Gora Category:Urban-type settlements in Perm Krai Category:Monotowns in Russia
title: Tyoplaya Gora
